courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar with our comprehensive beginner's course.
courses.longDescription: This comprehensive course takes you from absolute beginner to confident guitar player. You'll learn proper hand positioning, essential chords, strumming patterns, and how to read tablature. Our step-by-step approach ensures you build a solid foundation while having fun playing your favorite songs.
courses.instructorBio: John has been teaching guitar for over 15 years and has trained thousands of students worldwide.
syllabus: Basic Chords (A, D, E, G, C)

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Start your musical journey with foundational piano skills taught by expert instructors.
courses.longDescription: Discover the joy of playing piano with our beginner-friendly course. From understanding the keyboard layout to playing beautiful melodies, this course covers everything you need to start your piano journey. Learn proper technique, music reading, and develop the skills to play classical and contemporary pieces.
courses.instructorBio: Jane is a classically trained pianist with a Master's degree from Juilliard School of Music.

courses.title: Advanced Vocal Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your singing with advanced vocal techniques for intermediate to advanced learners.
courses.longDescription: Take your singing to the next level with our advanced vocal techniques course. Master breath control, expand your range, develop your unique style, and learn professional performance techniques. This course is designed for singers who want to refine their craft and unlock their full vocal potential.
courses.instructorBio: Emily is a professional vocalist with 20+ years of performance experience and has worked with Grammy-winning artists.
whatYouLearn: Extend your vocal range by an octave

courses.title: Drumming Mastery
courses.description: Master the drums with our comprehensive course covering all skill levels.
courses.longDescription: From basic beats to complex fills, this drumming course covers it all. Learn proper stick technique, develop your rhythm, and master various drumming styles including rock, jazz, funk, and Latin. Our comprehensive approach ensures steady progress for drummers of all levels.
courses.instructorBio: Mike has toured with major rock bands and has been the go-to session drummer in LA for over a decade.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz improvisation with this course designed for all levels.
courses.longDescription: Unlock the secrets of jazz improvisation with this comprehensive course. Learn to play over chord changes, develop your ear, understand jazz harmony, and create compelling solos. Whether you play piano, guitar, saxophone, or any other instrument, these concepts will transform your playing.
courses.instructorBio: Chris is a jazz saxophonist who has performed at Blue Note and has recorded with legendary jazz musicians.

courses.title: Music Production Fundamentals
courses.description: Dive into music production with this introductory course on the basics of sound engineering and mixing.
courses.longDescription: Start your journey into music production with this comprehensive introduction. Learn the fundamentals of DAWs, recording, mixing, and mastering. Understand signal flow, EQ, compression, and effects. By the end of this course, you'll be producing polished tracks from your home studio.
courses.instructorBio: Alex is a certified audio engineer with credits on multiple platinum albums and runs a successful home studio.

courses.title: Songwriting Essentials
courses.description: Learn the essentials of songwriting to express your musical creativity.
courses.longDescription: Discover the art and craft of songwriting in this comprehensive course. From generating ideas to completing polished songs, learn the techniques used by professional songwriters. Explore melody writing, lyric crafting, song structure, and how to overcome creative blocks.
courses.instructorBio: Samantha is a hitmaker with songs recorded by major artists and has won multiple songwriting awards.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create compelling electronic music with our course designed for beginners to advanced users.
courses.longDescription: Dive deep into electronic music production and learn to create professional-quality tracks. From sound design to arrangement, mixing to mastering for streaming, this course covers everything you need to produce EDM, house, techno, and more.
courses.instructorBio: Luke is a professional EDM producer with multiple releases on top labels and millions of streams worldwide.

courses.title: Classical Music History
courses.description: Explore the rich history of classical music from its origins to the present day.
courses.longDescription: Journey through centuries of classical music in this enlightening course. From medieval chants to contemporary compositions, explore the evolution of Western classical music. Understand the cultural contexts, analyze masterworks, and develop deep appreciation for this timeless art form.
courses.instructorBio: Dr. Grace Lee holds a PhD in Musicology from Yale and has published extensively on classical music history.

courses.title: Blues Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Discover the techniques of blues guitar to add soul and depth to your playing.
courses.longDescription: Master the soulful art of blues guitar with this comprehensive course. Learn essential licks, bending techniques, vibrato, and the pentatonic scale patterns that define the blues. Study the styles of legends like B.B. King, Stevie Ray Vaughan, and Eric Clapton.
courses.instructorBio: Ethan is a touring blues guitarist who has shared the stage with legends and teaches at Berklee College of Music.
